Overview   Energy & materials Health & resilience Work & prosperity Autodesk Foundation  Governance  Appendix 
Corporate governance
Company strategy
Accountability
Privacy and data security
Ethics and compliance
Human rights
Suppliers and  
business partners
Public policy The way we conduct our business is as important 
as the products we sell. We maintain robust and 
transparent processes to govern Autodesk as well 
as our impact strategy. We build trust with our 
employees, customers, investors, communities,  
and other stakeholders by acting with integrity 
and demonstrating strong and consistent values. 
As a technology company, protecting the privacy 
and security of our customers’ data through 
rigorous policies, systems, and practices is 
essential. More broadly, we promote and protect 
human rights across our value chain. To drive 
progress across industries, we promote public 
policies that align with our impact opportunity 
areas in an open manner.Governance
60
